concise_definition: n. 跳水, 潜水; v. 跳水, 潜水 (diving 是 dive 的现在分词和动名词形式)

definitions.explanation_en: The sport or activity of jumping or plunging headfirst into water, often performed with acrobatic maneuvers, especially in competitive contexts such as the Olympics.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指头朝下跳入水中，常伴随体操式动作的运动或活动，尤其在奥运会等竞技场合中。
definitions.example_en: She won a gold medal in synchronized diving at the World Championships.
definitions.example_cn: 她在世界锦标赛上赢得了双人跳水金牌。

definitions.explanation_en: The activity of swimming underwater using specialized equipment such as a scuba tank, typically for exploration, recreation, or research.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指使用潜水装备（如氧气瓶）在水下游泳的活动，通常用于探索、休闲或科研。
definitions.example_en: Diving in the Great Barrier Reef revealed a stunning array of coral and tropical fish.
definitions.example_cn: 在大堡礁潜水时，发现了令人惊叹的珊瑚和热带鱼类。

definitions.explanation_en: To plunge or jump headfirst into water, often from a height such as a diving board or cliff.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指从跳板、悬崖等高处头朝下跳入水中。
definitions.example_en: He was diving from the ten-meter platform when he injured his shoulder.
definitions.example_cn: 他从十米跳台跳水时伤到了肩膀。

definitions.explanation_en: To go underwater, especially using breathing apparatus, for a period of time.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指使用呼吸装置潜入水下并停留一段时间。
definitions.example_en: They spent the afternoon diving among the shipwrecks off the coast.
definitions.example_cn: 他们下午在海岸附近的沉船间潜水。

comparison.analysis: “Swimming” (游泳) 是指在水中通过肢体动作推进身体，通常在水面或水下水平移动，强调持续的运动和耐力。而 “diving” 强调的是进入水中的动作或水下探索行为，不一定是持续的游动，更侧重于入水瞬间或水下停留。
“Plunging” (猛冲/跳入) 是一个更通用的动词，指快速、突然地进入某物（如水、黑暗、混乱），不限于水或运动场景。而 “diving” 是特指进入水中的动作，且常带有技术性或体育性含义，如跳水或潜水。
“Submerging” (淹没/浸没) 是一个更中性、物理性的术语，指任何物体完全被液体覆盖，不涉及主动行为或运动意图。而 “diving” 是一个主动的、有目的的行为，通常由人执行，带有探索、运动或表演的意图。
